snippet: Ten bodies were found inside the Aswad garment factory in Gazipur, and several people were injured trying to escape from the building, a fire official said.
abstract: Fire at Aswad garment factory outside Dhaka, Bangladesh, kills 10 people and injures others who are trying to escape.
lead_paragraph: Ten bodies were found inside the Aswad garment factory in Gazipur, and several people were injured trying to escape from the building, a fire official said.
